meanings.definition: Having a normal immune system capable of mounting an appropriate response to pathogens.
meanings.sent1: The immunocompetent individual quickly fought off the flu virus.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend vaccines to keep the immune system of an immunocompetent person strong.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's immunocompetent shield protected the city from the invading germs.
meanings.sent4: Her immunocompetent armor defended her against the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The immunocompetent fortress of the body stood strong against the viral attack.

meanings.definition: A person or organism with a fully functional immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunocompetent in the group rarely fell ill.
meanings.sent2: An immunocompetent individual can better resist infections.
meanings.sent3: The immunocompetent warrior bravely faced the flu season.
meanings.sent4: The immunocompetent soldier fought off the invading viruses.
meanings.sent5: The immunocompetent hero saved the day by defeating the harmful bacteria.
